patthana22.7:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in MN 5.)
patthana22.7:0.3_0: he has laid down, and stands on the perception of the skillful.
patthana22.7:1.1_0: (The Teaching should not be expanded in brief.)
patthana22.7:11.1_0: (This is not the same thing as the other.)
patthana22.7:3.1_0: (The Teaching should not be expanded in brief.)
patthana22.7:5.1_0: (The Truth is not skilled in brief.)

patthana22.7:9.1_0: (The hindrances should not be expanded in brief.)
